entry.title: AJC 12V 105Ah Deep Cycle Marine and Boat Battery
entry.summary:
Vendor: BatteryClerk
Type: Marine and Boat
Price: 305.39

Info
  • AJC deep cycle batteries provide sustained power for extended periods of time. Deep cycle batteries are ideal for running devices like a trailer, fish finder, radio, lights, refrigerator or your house battery.
  • Non-spillable factory activated battery arrives fully sealed, charged and ready for action
  • Maintenance free AGM technology, no need to add acid or water ever
  • Exact OEM replacement guaranteed to fit easily and precisely
  • High impact PP case for maximum vibration resistance
  • AJC® Replacement Marine and Boat Batteries
  • You must re-use: your existing cabling and hardware. These are replacement batteries only
  • It is your responsibility to verify the batteries being ordered match the batteries in your unit prior to placing your order. We are not responsible for incorrect orders
  • Buy with confidence. Our batteries are backed by easy 30-day returns and a 12-month warranty
  • Built to handle whatever the road, dirt and water can dish out
Specs
  • BCI 12V 105Ah
  • Voltage: 12V
  • Capacity: 105Ah
  • Polarity:
  • Terminal: IT(M8)
  • Dimensions: L 12.99 x W6.85 x H 8.54 inches
  • Weight: 68.4 lbs

View Battery Specifications
